/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The trees, with their lush green leaves, stand tall on either side of the street, creating a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
